returns._0: cumulative price of target token regardless of pair order

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

AnchorPriceUpdated(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Emit this event when TWAP price is updated

TokenConfigAdded(address,address,uint256.notice: Emit this event when new token configs are added

TwapWindowUpdated(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Emit this event when TWAP window is updated

bnbBaseUnit().notice: the base unit of WBNB and BUSD, which are the paired tokens for all assets

currentCumulativePrice((address,uint256,.notice: Fetches the current token/WBNB and token/BUSD price accumulator from pancakeswap.

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying TWAP price of input vToken

newObservations(address).notice: The current price observation of TWAP. With old and current observations we can calculate the TWAP between this range

oldObservations(address).notice: The old price observation of TWAP

setTokenConfigs((address,uint256,address.notice: Add multiple token configs at the same time
